subject: Baseball
Little League World Series
lead_paragraph: Will Lucas threw a no-hitter, struck out 13 and hit a two-run single, and Fairfield, Conn., beat New Castle, Ind., in the Little League World Series.
snippet: Will Lucas threw a no-hitter, struck out 13 and hit a two-run single, and Fairfield, Conn., beat New Castle, Ind., in the Little League World Series.
